uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.parquetstore.index

Class GraphIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.parquetstore.index.GraphIndex

  • public class GraphIndex
extends Object
    This class is used to store a file-based groupToIndex for each group, i.e. for each group it stores a GroupIndex which is a set of ColumnIndexs. Each ColumnIndex contains a path to a file that contains data for that group along with minimum and maximum values of the indexed columns within that file. This allows queries for particular values of the indexed columns to skip files that do not contain relevant data.
